txt.en: Swivelling this mirror back into place should restore some light to the halls of Khazad-dûm. Once you have finished, you should seek out someone at the East Gate of Moria in Nud-melek.
'You found and corrected that mirror's position? Excellent! Did you run into any trouble?'
The dwarf-mirrors of Khazad-dûm once illuminated the underground halls, but many of them have since fallen into disrepair or have been knocked out of alignment.
Speak to a Guard at the East Gate of Moria in Nud-melek
Dwarves hold the East Gate of Moria in Nud-melek.\n\nYou should tell a guard of your continuing efforts towards lighting Khazad-dûm once more.
